question: Which of the following type of CICs are exempted from the requirement of registration with RBI?
option1: CICs with assets above Rs. 10 crore
option2: CICs with assets above Rs. 100 crore
option3: CICs with assets above Rs. 200 crore
answer: CICs with assets above Rs. 100 crore
explanation: CICs with asset size above Rs. 100 crore but not accessing public funds are also exempted from the requirement of registration with RBI.
